artist: Ikeda Terukata; Published by Akiyama Buemon
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: blue cloth covered album with light flowers; red title strip down center; contains diptychs of beautiful kimono-clad women; preface and titles of individual pictures on the first page
markings: Seals on each page | Sticker on back cover: Muromachi Tokyo / Manufactured by Akiyama
medium: Woodblock printed album; ink and color on paper
title: Brocades of Edo
